Binary: postfix, postfix-doc, postfix-ldap, postfix-lmdb, postfix-cdb, postfix-pcre, postfix-mongodb, postfix-mysql, postfix-pgsql, postfix-sqlite
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), default-libmysqlclient-dev, groff-base, html2text, libcdb-dev, libdb-dev, libicu-dev, libldap-dev, liblmdb-dev, libmongoc-dev [linux-any], libnsl-dev | libc6-dev (<< 2.37-15.1), libpcre2-dev, libpq-dev, libtlsrpt0-dev, libsasl2-dev, libsqlite3-dev, libssl-dev, patch, pkgconf, po-debconf, txt2man
Package-List: postfix deb mail optional arch=any postfix-cdb deb mail optional arch=any postfix-doc deb doc optional arch=all postfix-ldap deb mail optional arch=any postfix-lmdb deb mail optional arch=any postfix-mongodb deb mail optional arch=linux-any postfix-mysql deb mail optional arch=any postfix-pcre deb mail optional arch=any postfix-pgsql deb mail optional arch=any postfix-sqlite deb mail optional arch=any
Testsuite-Triggers: libsasl2-modules, lsb-release, procmail, python3, python3-pexpect, sasl2-bin, ssl-cert
Uploaders: LaMont Jones <lamont@debian.org>, Michael Tokarev <mjt@tls.msk.ru>, Scott Kitterman <scott@kitterman.com>
